title: Full Audit Trail Implementation
overview:
Audit trail is only partially implemented, leaving gaps in tracking what happened to items over time.

**Motivation:** Visibility and debugging - comprehensive history of item state changes and operations.

**Signals:** priority: medium
problem_statement: Audit trail is only partially implemented, leaving gaps in tracking what happened to items over time.
motivation: Visibility and debugging - comprehensive history of item state changes and operations.
